track.strTrack: Send My Love (to Your New Lover)
track.strDescriptionEN:
"Send My Love (To Your New Lover)" is a song recorded by English singer and songwriter Adele for her third studio album, 25 (2015). The song was written by Adele, Max Martin and Shellback, while production for the song was provided by the latter two. Lyrically, the track is a "happy you're gone" song. Musically, the song is a pop song. "Send My Love (To Your New Lover)" received generally favorable reviews from critics, who praised its production.

The song peaked at number 112 on the UK Singles Chart and number 79 on the US Billboard Hot 100. It also charted in Australia, Austria, Canada, Finland, France, Germany, Scotland, South Korea and Spain.
